questiontext.text:
Evaluate the sum of the infinite series :
$$\small \sum _{n=0}^{\infty }\:[-4(\frac{1}{3})^n-4(\frac{1}{9})^n]$$

[Calculate upto 2 significant figures]

Answer :
{1:NUMERICAL:=-10.5:0.05#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}
